name: Press E to die
description:
Every time you die you leave a Red cube in your place,use these cubes to activate switches,climb towers and cross pits.

--Controls--

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Press E to die and respawn
  • Press R to destroy most recent cube

--Credits--

Font used: Coolvetica

All other assets created by me

Game created with unity

Music and sound effects created with BoscaCeoil

--Notes--

There  not that many levels as I ran out of time,might return to the project in the future.

Hope you enjoy the game!
